docs.snippet: A study investigator writes that “countries with developed economies have paid for early education with public funds,” and we should, too....

docs.snippet: Europe in the 1930s and America in the 1890s faced many troubling conditions like we do today. They responded with very different answers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Europe in the 1930s and America in the 1890s faced many troubling conditions like we do today. They responded with very different answers.
docs.abstract: David Brooks Op-Ed column suggests America is faced with generational challenge, as evidenced by police shootings, violence against police and mendacity of main political parties' presidential candidates; warns path country takes will mean difference between descent into fascism and ascent to renewed national greatness.

headline.main: Are We on the Path to National Ruin?
headline.print_headline: Is the U.S.  on the Path to Ruin?

docs.snippet: Heading into the Republican convention, the House speaker has been hectored by both parties, the budget is stalled and his spotlight has been stolen....
docs.lead_paragraph: Heading into the Republican convention, the House speaker has been hectored by both parties, the budget is stalled and his spotlight has been stolen.
docs.abstract: Congressional Memo; Republican House Speaker Paul Ryan faces rocky path in selling party's agenda at Republican National Convention, with uncertainty of his rule over Congressional Republicans, growing pushback from House Democrats and his own shaky commitment to GOP's presumptive nominee Donald Trump.

headline.main: Can Paul Ryan Still Sell the G.O.P. Agenda?
headline.print_headline: Obstacles for Ryan on Path to Selling G.O.P. Agenda

docs.snippet: Historical parallels can take us only so far, but the echoes of everything from the populism of 1896 to the violence of 1968 are audible in 2016....

byline.original: By ARTHUR C. BROOKS and GAIL COLLINS

docs.snippet: After nearly five hours, the attorney general appeared to emerge unscathed from a contentious hearing on her decision to shut down a yearlong investigation....
docs.lead_paragraph: After nearly five hours, the attorney general appeared to emerge unscathed from a contentious hearing on her decision to shut down a yearlong investigation.
docs.abstract: Atty Gen Loretta Lynch offers few detail on investigation into Hillary Clinton's use of personal email server during testimony before House Judiciary Committee, instead repeatedly citing FBI Director James Comey's prior briefing to reporters; committee Republicans call Lynch's refusal to answer abdication of her responsibility and accuse her of stonewalling.

headline.main: House Panel Questions Loretta Lynch on Hillary Clinton’s Emails
headline.print_headline: Lynch Offers Few Details on Clinton Emails

docs.snippet: Democratic presidential hopeful Hillary Clinton extended her lead over Republican rival Donald Trump to 13 percentage points in a Reuters/Ipsos opinion poll released on Tuesday, up from 10 points at the end of last week....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic presidential hopeful Hillary Clinton extended her lead over Republican rival Donald Trump to 13 percentage points in a Reuters/Ipsos opinion poll released on Tuesday, up from 10 points at the end of last week.

headline.main: Clinton Extends Lead Over Trump to 13 Points: Reuters/Ipsos
headline.print_headline: Clinton Extends Lead Over Trump to 13 Points: Reuters/Ipsos

docs.snippet: The nation’s recent tragedies have forced Mr. Trump to try to present a new persona as a calm and comforting leader. So far, success has been evasive....
docs.lead_paragraph: The nation’s recent tragedies have forced Mr. Trump to try to present a new persona as a calm and comforting leader. So far, success has been evasive.
docs.abstract: Donald J Trump's atypically tenuous response to wave of racial violence between black men and police reflects his campaign's struggles to show a provocative and volatile candidate is capable of calm leadership.

headline.main: After Outbreaks of Violence, Donald Trump Strains to Project Leadership
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Awkward Response to Tragedies Lacked the Punch of His Fury

docs.snippet: Democrat Bernie Sanders endorsed former rival Hillary Clinton for president in a display of party unity on Tuesday, describing her as the best candidate to fix the United States' problems and beat Republican Donald Trump in the Nov. 8 election....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democrat Bernie Sanders endorsed former rival Hillary Clinton for president in a display of party unity on Tuesday, describing her as the best candidate to fix the United States' problems and beat Republican Donald Trump in the Nov. 8 election.

headline.main: Clinton Gets Sanders Endorsement in Show of Party Unity
headline.print_headline: Clinton Gets Sanders Endorsement in Show of Party Unity

docs.snippet: Differences over trade policies have led to an acrimonious relationship between the business association and the presumptive Republican nominee....
docs.lead_paragraph: Differences over trade policies have led to an acrimonious relationship between the business association and the presumptive Republican nominee.
docs.abstract: US Chamber of Commerce chief executive Thomas J Donohue expresses disdain for Donald J Trump’s economic policies following threats by Trump to rip up trade accords, put tariffs on Chinese goods and start a trade war; acrimonious relationship with presumptive nominee is historic change for  pro-business organization whose goals usually line up with Republican establishment.

headline.main: Trump and U.S. Chamber of Commerce Pull No Punches on Trade Policy
headline.print_headline: Trump and U.S. Chamber of Commerce Pull No Punches

docs.snippet: With hugs and handshakes, Bernie Sanders endorsed Hillary Clinton for president on Tuesday and emphatically told his supporters their "political revolution" must now turn to electing his Democratic former rival....

headline.main: 'Far and Away the Best': Sanders Finally Endorses Clinton
headline.print_headline: 'Far and Away the Best': Sanders Finally Endorses Clinton
